reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 73/01: WITHDRAWAL AND DELEGATION OF MINISTER'S AUTHORITY - REGIONAL MUNICIPALITY OF DURHAM AND THE TOWN OF WHITBY, CITY OF OSHAWA AND TOWN OF AJAX
reg_info.reg_name_text: WITHDRAWAL AND DELEGATION OF MINISTER’S AUTHORITY — REGIONAL MUNICIPALITY OF DURHAM AND THE TOWN OF WHITBY, CITY OF OSHAWA AND TOWN OF AJAX
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 73/01: WITHDRAWAL AND DELEGATION OF MINISTER'S AUTHORITY - REGIONAL MUNICIPALITY OF DURHAM AND THE TOWN OF WHITBY, CITY OF OSHAWA AND TOWN OF AJAX
reg_info.act_under: Planning Act   Loi sur l’aménagement du territoire

content.content: 1. In this Regulation, “Minister’s authority” means the Minister’s authority to give approval under section 51 of the Act, as it existed before March 28, 1995, continued by section 74.1 of the Act with respect to, (a) applications for approval of plans of subdivision whose file numbers are set out in Schedules 1 to 3, and (b) applications for approval or exemption of condominium descriptions under section 50 of the Condominium Act whose file numbers are set out in Schedules 4 and 5. O. Reg. 73/01, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. In this Regulation,

“Minister’s authority” means the Minister’s authority to give approval under section 51 of the Act, as it existed before March 28, 1995, continued by section 74.1 of the Act with respect to,

(a) applications for approval of plans of subdivision whose file numbers are set out in Schedules 1 to 3, and

(b) applications for approval or exemption of condominium descriptions under section 50 of the Condominium Act whose file numbers are set out in Schedules 4 and 5. O. Reg. 73/01, s. 1.

content.section: Delegation to Regional Municipality of Durham council revoked
content.content: 2. The delegation of the Minister’s authority to the council of The Regional Municipality of Durham with respect to the applications listed in Schedules 1 to 5 is withdrawn. O. Reg. 73/01, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. The delegation of the Minister’s authority to the council of The Regional Municipality of Durham with respect to the applications listed in Schedules 1 to 5 is withdrawn. O. Reg. 73/01, s. 2.

content.section: Delegation to City of Oshawa council
content.content: 3. The Minister’s authority with respect to the applications listed in Schedules 1 and 4 is delegated to the council of the City of Oshawa. O. Reg. 73/01, s. 3.
content.raw_html: 3. The Minister’s authority with respect to the applications listed in Schedules 1 and 4 is delegated to the council of the City of Oshawa. O. Reg. 73/01, s. 3.

content.section: Delegation to Town of Ajax council
content.content: 4. The Minister’s authority with respect to the applications listed in Schedule 2 is delegated to the council of the Town of Ajax. O. Reg. 73/01, s. 4.
content.raw_html: 4. The Minister’s authority with respect to the applications listed in Schedule 2 is delegated to the council of the Town of Ajax. O. Reg. 73/01, s. 4.

content.section: Delegation to Town of Whitby council
content.content: 5. The Minister’s authority with respect to the applications listed in Schedules 3 and 5 is delegated to the council of the Town of Whitby. O. Reg. 73/01, s. 5.
content.raw_html: 5. The Minister’s authority with respect to the applications listed in Schedules 3 and 5 is delegated to the council of the Town of Whitby. O. Reg. 73/01, s. 5.

content.content: 6. (1) If any Minister’s authority delegated under section 3, 4 or 5 to the council of the Town of Whitby, the City of Oshawa or the Town of Ajax is further delegated by the council to a committee of the council or an appointed officer under subsection 5 (1) of the Act, the council shall forward to the Minister a certified copy of the delegating by-law within 15 days of its passing. O. Reg. 73/01, s. 6 (1). (2) The delegation of authority set out in this Regulation is not terminated by reason only that subsection (1) is not complied with. O. Reg. 73/01, s. 6 (2).
content.raw_html:
6. (1) If any Minister’s authority delegated under section 3, 4 or 5 to the council of the Town of Whitby, the City of Oshawa or the Town of Ajax is further delegated by the council to a committee of the council or an appointed officer under subsection 5 (1) of the Act, the council shall forward to the Minister a certified copy of the delegating by-law within 15 days of its passing. O. Reg. 73/01, s. 6 (1).

(2) The delegation of authority set out in this Regulation is not terminated by reason only that subsection (1) is not complied with. O. Reg. 73/01, s. 6 (2).

7. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 73/01, s. 7.
